function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Communal spread of viral attacks leading to emergencies","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate individual health monitoring","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective tracking of geographical spread of the virus","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate support for workers in the event of a positive covid-19 case can result in fear, stigma, and reluctance to report symptoms, leading to underreporting of cases and increased risk of transmission.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 among construction workers","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance to estimate covid-19 presence and prevalence.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in correlating sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater with covid-19 prevalence due to various factors such as excretion differences, environmental variables, and unreported cases.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding infectivity of viral particles in sewage and feces","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater samples indicating potential contamination and spread of covid-19.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling sars-cov-2 in the laboratory environment","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination of influent and effluent water with mgv and pedv","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of contaminated materials after the rt-pcr assay.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and processing of wastewater and effluent water samples","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral rna extraction and quantification procedures","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of rt-pcr for viral rna detection","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater and effluent water with pedv and mgv viruses","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate safety measures during the concentration process leading to accidental exposure to viruses","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 rna detected in untreated wastewater samples","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Re-emerging zoonotic hepatitis e virus detected in the built environment","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poliovirus detected during the global eradication programme","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of coronavirus through respiratory droplets and possibly via fecal-oral route.","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in duration and magnitude of viral shedding in patients infected with sars-cov-2.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of insufficiently fitted face masks","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate detection and prediction of disease spread in urban areas","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor activities are closely related to virus spreading risk","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contact surface contamination","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate distancing measures leading to higher risk of virus transmission","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral transmission in buildings and transportation","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental contamination in hospitals","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus transmission in crowded and poorly ventilated rooms","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The rise of new variants of the virus that may challenge vaccine efficacy","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in testing rate in the most deprived areas signals a deterioration in access to preventive measures.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased use of public transport due to fear of contagion","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited or resigned use of public transport","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of infection with covid-19 leading to a shift from public transport to private vehicles.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of coronavirus infection leading to limited mobility and social lives","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Passengers declare a majority of factors as important for their comfort in public transport, indicating a potential risk of transmission of contagious diseases from other passengers.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of literature on the effects of covid-19 on construction firms","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evidence-based research on the recommended use of anti-inflammatory drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of impacts of interventions","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scant evidence on long-term effects such as school disengagement for children of immigrants","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data on educational attainment of children of immigrants during the crisis","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clusters of covid-19 cases with unknown transmission source","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community transmission leading to large outbreaks and high number of incidents and deaths","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid outbreak of covid-19","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators, icus, and ppe in hospitals","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient number of testing kits leading to infeasibility of large-scale covid-19 testing.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to distinguish covid-19 symptoms from common flu, leading to challenges in determining testing criteria.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of large scale testing for covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"}]}
